properties.description: Whether or not drawer should close on mouse down and move out
properties.name: _close

properties.description: Whether or not the drawer is displayed
properties.name: _displayed

properties.description: Whether or not the drawer has been first shown
properties.name: _loaded

properties.description: Store the drawer size unit distance depending on drawer slide direction
properties.name: _sizeProperty

properties.description: Interval function used for complete slide triggering functionality
properties.name: _slideTimeInterval

properties.description: Pixels the drawer have to exceed to trigger translation
properties.name: dragLimit

properties.description: Includes the elements that should not trigger drawer hide
properties.name: preventCloseNodes

properties.description: Includes the drawer inner elements that should not trigger drawer drag
properties.name: preventDragNodes

properties.description: Drawer side position type         Values: left, right, top, bottom         Default: left
properties.name: type

methods.description: Check if drag configuration limit value is exceeded
methods.name: _isDragLimitExceeded

return.description: Whether or not the drag limit is exceeded

methods.description: Check if a node is inside an array
methods.name: _isOnArray

return.description: Whether or not the node exists on the array

methods.description: Proccess a position value and add the new translation distance
methods.name: _proccesPosition

methods.description: Translate drawer type a specific distance
methods.name: _translate

methods.description: Close/show drawer if a quick slide is performed
methods.name: _triggerCompleteSlide
